author: wrowe
msg: * The idle thread timeout statistic was being incremented each time an
idle thread (whether a timeout was set or not) was reaped.  Updated
the check to only increment when a timeout was set.
* The test to determine if a thread should go into probation was >=
when it should have been just > since the idle_cnt has been incremented
by the time this test is made.
Submitted by: Joe Mudd <Joe.Mudd sas.com>
Reviewed by: Henry Jen
Backports: 543234

author: lu4242
msg: added configExcluded param for avoid component class on faces-config.xml

author: trawick
msg: mod_cgid: Don't try to restart the daemon if it fails to initialize the socket.
It won't get any better without intervention, and it will fork() until some
sort of intervention.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for consolidating the manual PDF/html files
